channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thousands flee as wildfires burn out of control and destroy homes across the Los Angeles area
Special counsel's Trump report should be partially released, DOJ says
item.description: The Justice Department told a federal appeals court that the portion of special counsel Jack Smith's report on his investigation involving the 2020 el...

item.title: How did surviving cancer shape your life? We want to hear from you
item.description: Living through cancer can change you — it puts pressure on everything, from your relationships to your career to your sense of self. Share how it's af...

item.title: Huge problems with axing fact-checkers, Meta oversight board says
item.description: The body's co-chair says moving to community notes could have a big impact on gender rights and minority groups.

item.title: Germany and France warn Trump over threat to take over Greenland
item.description: The EU's two leading members were reacting to the US president-elect's plans to acquire Denmark's autonomous territory.

item.title: "Wicked" leads with 4 Screen Actors Guild Award nominations
item.description: The Screen Actors Guild Awards nominations canceled an in-person announcement planned for Wednesday morning due to devastating wildfires and winds in ...

item.title: High winds, lack of rain and climate change stoking California fires
item.description: Experts say that rising global temperatures are making wild fires more likely in California.

item.title: Trump asks the Supreme Court to block sentencing in his hush money case in New York
Images show Palisades Fire, other blazes ravaging Los Angeles area
item.description: Striking images from Los Angeles County show the early extent of damage caused by the Palisades Fire and other wildfires.

item.title: Survival of the luckiest? New study hints at the potential role of luck in evolution
item.description: A new study on mice shows that luck in early life can determine success as an adult, especially when competition is high.

item.title: What happens when you lose a credit card debt collection lawsuit?
item.description: A few different scenarios could occur if a judgment is issued against you for your old credit card debt.

item.title: US slaps sanctions on close aide to Hungary's Viktor Orban
item.description: Antal Rogan is one of the most powerful men in Orban's government and heads his cabinet office.

item.title: How bad is the California wildfire smoke for health?
item.description: Tens of thousands of people are evacuating Los Angeles as wildfires blaze across the region, emitting dangerous smoke. Here's how it impacts health.

item.title: After Helene's floods, North Carolina tries to tame trauma's lasting damage

item.title: Where is Greenland and why does Trump want it?
item.description: Though the president-elect's rhetoric is unusual, for over a century a succession of US presidents have tried to gain control of Greenland.

item.description: The Justice Department says it will release special counsel Jack Smith’s findings on Donald Trump’s efforts to undo the results of the 2020 presidenti...
